Caption: Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Chairman, Board of Governors, addresses the audience
Description: On the dais (from left), Dr. G. S. Laddha, Director, A. C. College of Technology, Madras, Dr. K. S. G. Doss, Chemicals and Plastics India Ltd. Madras, Prof. S. Sampath, Department of Electrical Engineering, Prof. A. Ramachandran, Director, and chief guest Dr. Vikram A. Sarabhai. The Chairman, in a brief speech, paid a tribute to the outstanding contributions made by Dr. Sarabhai to the countryâ€™s scientific and technological progress, and requested him to address the graduates.
